Description:
A Talent Acquisition Specialist is responsible for sourcing, attracting, and hiring top talent for our company. The ideal candidate will have experience in full-cycle recruiting and a strong understanding of different sourcing techniques. They will be responsible for developing and implementing recruitment strategies, conducting interviews, and ensuring a positive candidate experience throughout the hiring process.Responsibilities:Collaborate with hiring managers to understand their recruitment needs and develop job descriptions and specifications
Source potential candidates through online channels (e.g. social platforms, job boards, professional networks) and offline methods (e.g. career fairs, referrals)
Screen resumes and applications to identify qualified candidates
Conduct phone, video, and in-person interviews to assess candidate qualifications and cultural fit
Coordinate and schedule interviews with hiring managers and candidates
Administer and evaluate pre-employment assessments and tests
Conduct reference checks and verify employment and educational qualifications of candidates
Present job offers and negotiate compensation packages
Maintain candidate databases and ensure compliance with data protection regulations
Stay up-to-date with best practices in recruitment and talent acquisitionSkills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Human Resources or a related field
Proven experience as a Talent Acquisition Specialist or similar role
Strong knowledge of recruitment techniques and best practices
Experience using applicant tracking systems and HR databases
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Ability to handle multiple tasks and prioritize workload
Strong attention to detail and problem-solving skills
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Flexibility and adaptability to changing priorities and requirements
Knowledge of labor laws and regulations

Experience with recruitment tools and platforms
Excellent sourcing and networking skills
Ability to assess candidate qualifications and cultural fit
Strong negotiation and influencing skills
Knowledge of industry trends and best practices in talent acquisition
